text: Dear All, The Ph.D. viva-voce examination of Ms. Marvi Kaushik (2018CHZ8085) will be held on Monday, December 23rd, 2024, at 10.00 am. The title of her thesis is "NOx operating cycle in Pd/zeolite passive NOx adsorbers". The viva will be conducted through video conferencing, for which the link is given below. All are cordially invited to attend the seminar. The abstract of the seminar is attached herewith.

text: Dear All, The class convenor has informed me that many of you are heavily engaged with internship activities this week. As a result, he has requested that we reschedule the quiz to next week on 20th August. If anyone has any concerns with this change, please let me know by midnight today (12th August). No response would mean that everyone wants the quiz to be shifted to the 20th. For your information, the second quiz is tentatively scheduled for 27th August. Regards, Vikram
label: HIGH

text: Dear All, We will have a quiz on Wednesday at 5 pm in LH 121. The quiz will be on Moodle. Syllabus - everything covered till lecture 7. Regards, Vikram
label: HIGH

text: Dear Students, The rooms, LH108 and LH111 (if needed) will be made available for the purpose of studying for the upcoming examinations from September 9, 2024, until September 19, 2024, between 9 PM of each day and 6 AM of the next day. Cleaning routines start in these rooms from 6:30 AM onwards. Therefore, you need to vacate the LHC by 6 AM. The movement of the students will be restricted only to the designated rooms. You must strictly follow the instructions of the security personnel on duty. Please use this facility with responsibility and civic sense. As usual, the entry and exit of the students will be recorded/inspected. Therefore, you must carry your institute ID card. Best wishes for your exams.
label: MEDIUM
